Product_Name: Layham Combed Cotton Double Zip Overshirt
Product_Description: Oliver Sweeney's double zip Milano overshirt is made from 100% combed cotton with a Milano knit stitch. The overshirt is fully fashioned with a dropped back shoulder seam to keep a clean profile - combined with the Milano knit the overshirt has more of a jacket feel. The cuffs, hem and placket are neatly finished with a tubular jersey knit and the two-way zip (opening at the base and top) has a brushed stainless steel finish.

Product_Name: Parchment Long Sleeve Shirt, Blue
Product_Description: Here’s an intriguing design, first sketched for Liberty Fabrics in 1982 but left unfinished. It allows us to see all facets of the design process, peeling back the layers to expose initial silhouettes through to realistic and detailed final illustrations. It’s an essay in blues, with roses, poppies, narcissi and tulips so densely packed that there’s almost and abstract quality. Just perfect with jeans or chinos and a brightly coloured belt.
